ace.gson.directory

Class JsonFilesDirectory

  • java.lang.Object
    • FilesDirectory
      • ace.gson.directory.JsonFilesDirectory
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    JsonArraysDirectory, JsonObjectsDirectory

    public class JsonFilesDirectory
extends FilesDirectory
    Useful json element files directory class.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JsonFilesDirectory(java.lang.String path)
      Constructor accepting a directory path.
      JsonFilesDirectory(java.lang.String path, <any> readingAdapter, <any> writingAdapter)
      Constructor accepting a directory path and adapters for reading and writing.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      JsonElement get(java.lang.String name)
      Gets the json element content of the file with the specified name.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,JsonElement> getElementsAsMap()
      Gets as a map the contents (file name with json element content for each file) of the json element directory.
      void iterateElements(NamedJsonElementCallback callback)
      Iterates the all of file names of the json element directory loading its json content and calling the specified callback with them.
      boolean put(java.lang.String name, JsonElement item)
      Sets the specified json element content of the file with the specified name.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
